actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to provide for the striking of medals commemorating the 200th anniversary of the encampment of the American Army during the bitter winter of Valley Forge.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to strike and deliver to the Valley Forge Historical Society, Incorporated, Valley Forge, Pennsylvania, not more than 50,000 sterling silver and bronze medals in commemoration of the two hundredth anniversary of the encampment of the American Army commanded by General George Washington during the winter at Valley Forge, Pennsylvania.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the striking of medals commemorating the 200th anniversary of the encampment of the American Army during the bitter winter of Valley Forge.
